nodeList.altText: The only direct source of damage that Ring of Shields can do is with the Shrapnel node.
nodeList.description:
Shields take less fire damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), and have a chance to ignite enemies that hit them. 

If you have the {Collateral Damage} node the base physical damage of the {Shrapnel} it creates is converted to fire damage.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Shields take 50% less fire damage. 100% of damage that Shields deal is converted to fire. 

Collateral Damage ignites enemies.
